We do not allow any CPU intensive processes on our nodes, if you plan on using over 90% of a core for an extended period of time you will be suspended. Legal adult content, private VPNs, and private proxies are all allowed. BitCoin mining or similar is not allowed along with anything that is illegal in the United States.
